title: "Apple to Halt Sales of 2 Smartwatches Amid Patent Dispute"
text: "Apple is set to halt sales of two models of its smartwatch in the coming days as the company prepares to comply with a U.S. import ban related to a patent dispute."

title: "Apple halts US sales of Series 9 and Ultra 2 Apple watches amid ITC ban"
text: "Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) will cease selling the Apple Watch Series 9 and Ultra 2 models in the US from December 21st
source_name: complying with aÂ US International Trade Commission (ITC) import ban following a patent dispute with medical device maker Masimo over its SpO2 sensor. The ban
date: affecting only the flagship Series 9 and Ultra 2 models
topics: won't impact the Apple Watch SE or previous models without the blood oxygen sensor."

title: "Tesla's growing union dispute could morph into a 'brush fire'"
text: "The next union battleground could be Tesla. How Tesla responds to labor disputes in Scandinavia could shape talks with UAW."
